creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: collar of Valenciennes lace with a design of naturalistic flowers on a diamond-shaped réseau, the sides of the mesh being made by four braided threads. The designs are outlined by a line of open work. The picots are an integral part of the lace. Mounted on a piece of net with a diamond shaped réseau, each side being made by a double, twisted thread.
title: Collar
